org.grouplens.lenskit.knn.item.model

Class ItemwiseBuildContextProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.knn.item.model.ItemwiseBuildContextProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.inject.Provider<ItemItemBuildContext>

    public class ItemwiseBuildContextProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.inject.Provider<ItemItemBuildContext>

    Builder for ItemItemBuildContext that normalizes per-item, not per-user. More efficient when using e.g. item-based normalization. Right now it only works for rating data.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ItemwiseBuildContextProvider(ItemEventDAO edao, ItemDAO idao, ItemVectorNormalizer norm)
      Construct a new build context provider.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ItemwiseBuildContextProvider

        @Inject
public ItemwiseBuildContextProvider(ItemEventDAO edao,
                                   ItemDAO idao,
                                   ItemVectorNormalizer norm)

        Construct a new build context provider.

        Parameters:
        edao - The item-event DAO.
        idao - The item DAO.
        norm - The item vector normalizer. This is applied to item rating vectors. You should take care to use a compatible normalizer for the item scorer (e.g. if this uses a MeanCenteringVectorNormalizer, then you should use ItemMeanRatingItemScorer for the user vector normalization in the scorer).
